channel.title: CVE Feed for Docker -- Docker Desktop
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Docker -- Docker Desktop

item.title: CVE-2023-1802|2023-04-06T08:52:19.506Z -- docker -- docker%20desktop
item.description: In Docker Desktop 4.17.x the Artifactory Integration falls back to sending registry credentials over plain HTTP if the HTTPS health check has failed.Â A targeted network sniffing attack can lead to a disclosure of sensitive information. Only users who have Access Experimental Features enabled and have logged in to a private registry are affected.
